name: Krista Kelly
birth_place: 加拿大,安大略省,多伦多
introduction: Krista Kelly is a Canadian adult model who appeared as Playboy's Playmate of the Month for April 2004. As a tall (177 cm), buxom porn model with athletic body shape, she appeared in the 2005 Playmates at Play at the Playboy Mansion swimsuit calendar as calendar girl of November. The calendar was the inaugural Playmates at Play calendar and it was shot on the grounds of Playboy Mansion in 2004. She has also appeared in several Special Edition magazines for Playboy.
